title: EPLG
description: Schema definition for the EPLG benchmark parameters.

benchmark_name.description: Name of the benchmark. Must be 'EPLG' for this schema.

qubit_num.description: Number of qubits to use in this benchmarking.

lengths.description: List of layer lengths (the number of depth points).

num_samples.description: How many random circuits should be sampled for each layer length.

seed.description: Seed for the random number generator.

two_qubit_gate.description: Two‑qubit gate name to use in layers (e.g. 'cx', 'cz', 'ecr').

one_qubit_basis_gates.description: One‑qubit gate names to use for random 1q‑Clifford layers.
